page.title: 18Morecambe Sports Hall
page.content: Morecambe High School was going to get a Sports Hall in April 1985 as the Sports Council had promised a grant if the City Council would provide some of the cost.The City Council decided that they would not provide any money.This caused a great discussion especially in the press.Letters and petitions were brought before the council urging them to reconsider.So at this point we had no Sports Hall and seemed unlikely to get one as we were not on the Education Committee's list.After all the public discussion and the refusal of the Council to change their minds,the Education Committee decided to put us top of their list.Even though this new Sports Hall will be smaller than the original,we had managed to win our campaign for a new Sports Hall.
